channel.title: William Pansky | Dallas, TX
channel.description: Recent content on William Pansky | Dallas, TX

item.title: Deploying a standalone landing page site for Goodwill Dallas' annual fundraising event, THE LUNCH, with GoHugo.io
item.description: Introduction The Lunch, Goodwill Industries of Dallas' annual fundraising event, found wonderful success for its first two years – securing over $1.5m each year to, “... expand and enhance job training services.” For 2017, I suggested a revamp of how to present the event and guest speaker information to visitors and donors that would match the high level of importance that Goodwill Dallas places on the event. Prior year information was housed in a subpage of goodwilldallas.
Managed company’s online portfolio. Designed client-specific graphic t-shirt orders ready for print. Recreated low-resolution and pixelated high school logos in Illustrator for use.

item.title: Respect My Pretty
item.description: Shana Mcmillan approached me, thanks to a tip via our mutual friend Krystal René with an opportunity to go wild and create some really interesting and visually exciting t-shirt designs. Respect My Pretty is the movement ”…of girls, women demanding respect for our individuality as well as embracing the individuality of others-” and Shana really wanted to have that driven home in the art. Speak No Ugly HANDSOME

item.title: Serendipitax
item.description: Collaboration with the same crew of Estranged, I was once again commissioned to create key art for the group’s, named 17 Productions, next indie short film. Serendipitax is about Michael’s chance to recruit an inmate to his side, but his own psychological paranoia taxed his potential to save her. Photography by the talented Krystal Hills.

item.title: Self-Titled EP
item.description: Many years ago I created an album for a local band named Solcide; they loved the work. They enjoyed it so much that contacted me again, years later, and hired me to whip them up something new for their latest project - Tungsten Wake.

item.title: Evol World
item.description: Alex the Great’s original Evol World art.

item.title: The Strangle and The Struggle EP
item.description: Monique Hernandez-Fuentes, an old friend of mine, presented me with the opportunity to design her EP album, The Strangle & the Struggle. You can listen to the entire EP for free online at SoundCloud and purchase the physical copy at StoreEnvy. Cover art by Lango Oliveira.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please fill out the form below and I will respond back to you as soon as I can. Talk to you soon.

item.title: Creating a Flipboard.com style article layout using UIkit & VelocityJS
DNN website for the Dallas branch of national NPO, Goodwill Industries
item.description: Introduction For over 90 years Goodwill Dallas has been committed to providing job training and employment to those with disabilities and disadvantaging conditions. As part of the creative department of Miller Ad Agency, we collaborated and worked to bring Goodwill Dallas the new life it came looking for. Objective Establish and implement a new identity for Goodwill Dallas; a fresh look to update their brand and bring the Dallas branch, with it’s 15+ store locations, up to the modern age.

item.title: Digital Design & Front-End Dev
Faking load with setTimeout and UIkit's <progress> element
How I organize my project assets; installable via Bower
item.description: Installation If you’re a crazy person and, for some odd reason, want to download and tinker then be my guest. You can install with the Bower package manager. bower install pansky-boilerplate --save Primary tools - SCSS - Gulp - Babel - Babili - PostCSS - CSSnano - AutoPrefixer - Stylelint - Rename - SASS - SourceMaps - Util - Vinyl FTP SCSS file structure I compartmentalize my SCSS partial files into the following structure:

item.title: Resume
item.description: Front-end Web Developer Sabre Corporation JUL 2017–PRESENT — Southlake, TX Global leader in innovative technology that leads the travel industry. Graphic designer & front-end web developer Miller Ad Agency JUN 2014–JUL 2017 (3.2yr) — Dallas, TX Full-service advertising agency. Constructed developmental workflow systems for proper SemVer codebase management using industry-standard build tools and software, including: SCSS/SASS, PostCSS, Gulp, Babel, & Git. Deployed Wordpress websites using popular plugins, like WooCommerce and Elementor Page Builder.

item.title: The Struggle EP
item.description: Tungsten Wake, man; they hit me up again! This time for a single ep release they had coming out soon. I love the final turnout of this one.

item.title: Tinkering with Apple-esque fullscreen accordions
VelocityJS mobile sidebar menu experiment
Wordpress CMS platform built with Elementor Pro for Dallas full-service ad agency
item.description: Introduction Over the course of my third year at Miller Ad Agency I became increasingly infatuated with front-end web development. I learned as much as I could, I dreamt about UI and UX before falling asleep, I carved out a (basically) web-only position for myself; if it were possible to eat web dev – I’d have probably done that too. My awesome art director and good friend, Sasha Gelemanovic, knew he needed a way to keep me interested in the day-to-day workload.

item.description: Illusive Apparel delivers award-winning graphic artists create fresh and cutting edge designs. Case study coming soon. To view the demo site, click here.
